room_title: Escape room "Sanitarium" by Kersey Valley Escape in Archdale
room_description: Welcome to Shady Ways Sanitarium Escape at Kersey Valley is an industry first of its kind, built from the ground up as a multi-story escape game with 5 extremely detailed rooms. The art department and designers at Kersey Valley went all out and created a truly one-of-a-kind experience in the Escape game industry with our Shady Ways Sanitarium Escape. The extremely detailed environment makes you feel as if you just stepped into the set of an old Alfred Hitchcock thriller. Open daily, year-round no matter the weather. It may look old and abandoned, but it's built with the most modern climate control comforts of today.
